Unit 1.text: The children are  at a book fair.
They dress up  as different characters.
I can turn you into a fairy!
A wizard  is a man  with magical powers.
He uses these powers  to help or harm people.
A pirate sails on a ship  and steals things from other ships.
An elf is a very small person with pointed ears.
The storyteller is telling the children  an interesting story.
There are different kinds of books  for the children to read  at the book fair.
This book is about  a brave boy.
He travels through  a dangerous jungle.
There are  a lot of fun pictures in this book.
It teaches you  how to cook.
This book is about a detective.
He is clever and catches bad people.
This book is about an alien.
He lives on a strange planet.
It is a science fiction story.

Unit 2.text: Sally and Ella  are writing to each other  about their school trips.
Dear Ella,
How are you?
How is your new school life?
We had lots of school trips last term.
We went to the art gallery  and the theme park.
Then, we went to the aquarium.
There  were lots of lovely sea animals.
We saw jellyfish, seahorses, dolphins and baby sharks!
In one tank, there were some special fish.
The aquarium keeper  threw food into the tank  and the fish all fought for the food.
It was amazing to watch!
I took lots of photos of them.
How were your school trips?
Was there always a guide?
Were there lots of things to see?
The new Puppet theatre seems interesting.
Do you want to go there with me?
Best, Sally
Dear Sally,
Great to hear from you!
The aquarium sounds fun.
I want to see the baby sharks!
My only school trip last term was  to the botanical garden  and it was not great.
There was a guide, but she spoke very fast.
My classmates and I could not understand what she said!
I only made a few notes.
There was a lot of information about the flowers and trees.
I red it all  and got a headache!
Then my friends went to the shops  and bought some souvenirs, but I forgot my money!
Silly me!
I took lots of photos  but later  I lost my camera!
I felt so unhappy.
I want to visit the new puppet theatre.
Let's go there together next month!
Love, Ella
